A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thoroughly enjoyed this movie. It sits comfortably in the top 3 Star Wars movies along with Episodes 4 and 5 in my opinion. I am someone who is looking to be surprised during my movie-going experience\, and am often disappointed in that regard. This movie had genuine twists\, turns and surprises (which may be why it has received tepid reviews from audience members). I loved this movie. It did not feel like a typical second act of a trilogy and delivers while standing on its own. I’m excited that Rian has been given the reigns to a new trilogy after Episode 9!
